thread.title: ENMORE (Formerly CBI BIZ) Will Present the 8th Asia Bunker Forum
thread.title_full: ENMORE (Formerly CBI BIZ) Will Present the 8th Asia Bunker Forum

title: ENMORE (Formerly CBI BIZ) Will Present the 8th Asia Bunker Forum
text:
Print 
SHANGHAI--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Along with the upgrade of global fuel emission control, low sulfur and environment-friendliness has become the mainstream of the bunker industry, which leads to an increase in the orders for larger ships. 
Meanwhile, the shipping market is estimated to continue suffering capacity surplus in the near future. What are the impacts on the bunker market? 
Hot topics 
With the upgrade of global ship-emissions limit, how will the Asian low-sulfur fuel oil market develop? 
Development of LNG Ships and the impacts on the marine fuel oil market 
Application prospects of scrubber 
Capital chain, credit policies and risk management of enterprises in the present economic situation 
Market 1 -- Middle East 
Major UAE ports’ throughput in 2015 VS marine fuel oil consumption trends 
Market 2 -- Southeast Asia 
India’s marine fuel oil market trends 
Cambodia’s export growth and Phnom Penh Autonomous Port’s expansion plans 
Market 3 -- Northeast Asia 
South Korea’s marine fuel oil market and port development plans 
Japan marine fuel oil supply 
For more information, please visit the official website: http://abf.cbibiz.com/51404/index.html 
About ENMORE (formerly CBI BIZ) 
ENMORE (formerly CBI CHINA) is the largest integrated service provider in China’s commodity markets. We focus on the industry chains of energy, chemical, iron & steel, non-ferrous metal, and pulp & paper to provide services on market intelligence, events, consulting, and advertisement. Bringing together over 700 professionals, ENMORE has served over 73,000 multi-national and local clients with customized information and proven solutions. Shanghai ENMORE Commercial Development Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Shanghai (Business Registration Number: 310114563127953). View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150713005708/en/ Contact:
